nba:
- Is the logo shape a vertical rectangle with rounded corners?
- Is the background of the logo divided vertically into two equal parts, with the left side blue and the right side red?
- Is there a white silhouette of a basketball player dribbling a ball in the center of the logo?
- Is there an inscription of "NBA" located at the bottom center of the logo in bold white letters?
- Is the font of the "NBA" text sans-serif?
- Is the border around the logo thin and white, maintaining consistent thickness throughout?
- Is the spacing consistent and equal around the white silhouette and text within the logo?
